name: Emperor’s Hyena
damage_resistances: cold, necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: understands Common and Darakhul but can’t speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The emperor’s hyena makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Black Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The emperor’s hyena breathes a 15-foot cone of noxious black vapor. Each creature in the area that isn’t an undead or a construct must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature gains one level of exhaustion. This exhaustion lasts until the creature finishes a short or long rest.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The emperor’s hyena has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hyena’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the emperor’s hyena must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the emperor’s hyena’s Stench for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Turning Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The emperor’s hyena has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
